pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model Wrappers for Rule-Based Models // Bindings for additional models for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include prediction rule ensembles (Friedman and Popescu, 2008) doi:10.1214/07-AOAS148, C5.0 rules (Quinlan, 1992 ISBN: 1558602380), and Cubist (Kuhn and Johnson, 2013) doi:10.1007/978-1-4614-6849-3.
